name: HUBE: Seeker of Achievements
description: HUBE: Seeker of Achievements - is a hardcore-platformer game. Try to open all game levels, and collect all achievements.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7,8,10 Processor: 2.0 GHz CPU Dual Core Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7,8,10 Processor: Core i3 or higher Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
